titles: Here begynneth the rule of seynt Benet
author: Benedict, Saint, Abbot of Monte Cassino.
Fox, Richarde, b. ca. 1447.
publisher: Imprinted (by the co[m]au[n]dement of the reuerend faher i god, Richard Bishope of Winchester) by me Rycharde Pynson printer vnto the kynges noble grace,
notes: On A2 verso, Fox says he had this printed on Jan. 22, 1516 [o.s.]--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Monasticism and religious orders --  Rules --  Early works to 1800.
Benedictine movement (Anglican Communion) --  Early works to 1800.
